pages.text: 78|31|(ayinum), iraiyaccamutaiyavarkalukko niccayamaka patukappana (corkkam ennum) itam untu
78|32|(anku vacippatarku) tottankalum (avarril pucippatarku avarkalukku) tiratcaik kanikalum untu
78|33|(manaivikalaka) ore vayatutaiya (kannalakikalana) nencu nimirnta kannikalum
78|34|(panankal) nirainta kinnankalum (avarkalukkuk kitaikkum)
78|35|anku avarkal vin varttaiyaiyum poyyaiyum ceviyura mattarkal
78|36|(ivaiyellam ivarkalin nanmaikalukkuk) kanakkana kuliyakavum (kitaikkum. Atarku mel) umatu iraivan purattal nankotaiyakavum (innum atikam) avarkalukkuk kitaikkum
78|37|avane vanankal, pumi, ivarrukku mattiyilulla anaittin urimaiyalanum alavarra arulalanum avan. Eninum, (annalil evarume) avan mun peca cakti peramattarkal

78|38|jiprayilum, vanavarkalum ani aniyaka nirkum annalil, evarume avan mun peca (cakti pera) mattarkal. Eninum, rahman evarukku anumati kotuttu ‘‘cari! Pecuviraka!'' Enavum kurinano avar (mattum) pecuvar
78|39|Ittakaiya nal (varuvatu) uruti! Akave, virumpiyavan tan iraivanitame tankum itattait tetikkollavum

78|40|camipattil niccayamaka unkalukku varakkutiya oru vetanaiyaip parri nam eccarikkai ceykirom. Annalil ovvoru manitanum tan karankal ceyta ceyalin palanai(t tan kannal) kantukolvan. Nirakarippavano tan mannaka akaventume enru pulampuvan
79|1|(pavikalin uyirkalaip) palamakap parippavarkal mitu cattiyamaka
79|2|(nallavarkalin atmavai) elitakak kaipparrupavarkal mitu cattiyamaka
79|3|(akayattilum, katalilum) ativekamaka(p parantu) nintic cellum vanavarkal mitu cattiyamaka
79|4|(iraivanin kattalaiyai niraiverra) potti pottukkontu munti celpavarkal mitum cattiyamaka
79|5|ellak kariyankalaiyum (iraivanin kattalaippati) nirvakikkinra (vana)varkal mitu cattiyamaka
79|6|(kotiya pukampattal pumi) palamaka atircciyurum nalil
79|7|(melum) atait totarntu (pala pukampa atirccikal) varum (nalil ulakam mutivurre tirum)
79|8|annalil, ullankalellam titukkittu natunkik kontirukkum
79|9|parvaikalellam (payattal) kilnokki nirkum
79|10|(ivvarirukka, nirakarippavarkal itai maruttu) ‘‘nam (iranta pinnar) meyyakave nam (uyirppikkappattu) muntiya nilaimaikkut tiruppappatuvoma
79|11|(atuvum) nam ukki elumpakap ponatan pinnara (uyir kotuttu eluppappatuvom?) Enru kurukinranar
79|12|‘‘avvarayin, atu perum nastamana mitcitan enrum avarkal (parikacamakak)'' kurukinranar
79|13|(itu avarkalukku acattiyamakat tonralam; eninum, namakko) atu or atattal (oru uruttal, oru captam)tan
79|14|utane avarkal anaivarum (uyir perreluntu) vantu oru titalil kutivituvarkal
79|15|(Napiye!) Musavutaiya ceyti umakku ettiyata
